welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villefontaine, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at St-Exupéry Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at St-Exupéry Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
